definition: to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!

sentences.english: There is no doubt he is the "Rock Star" CEO.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，他就是传说中的“摇滚明星式”CEO。

sentences.english: One trade group has turned to a rock band called Gyoko, or Fishing Port.
sentences.chinese: 某个行业团体已经求助一个叫做“渔港”的摇滚乐队。

sentences.english: Only rock stars are allowed to wear leather pants. 12.
sentences.chinese: 只有摇滚明星才允许穿皮裤。

sentences.english: The promoters figured "peace" would link the anti-war sentiment to the rock concert.
sentences.chinese: 促进者们表示，“和平”将反战情绪带进摇滚音乐会。

sentences.english: Below gave everyone a good feeling villages light rock song.
sentences.chinese: 下面送给大家一首好听的乡村轻摇滚感觉的歌。

sentences.english: In one word, I love bel canto and Rock & Roll a little more than other forms of performance.
sentences.chinese: 一句话，我喜欢美声和摇滚多过其他形式的音乐。

sentences.english: Bill gets a kickout of listening to rock music.
sentences.chinese: 比尔从听摇滚乐中得到快乐。

sentences.english: College stations play all kinds of music, from jazz to hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 大学电台播放各种类型的音乐，从爵士到重摇滚。

sentences.english: What do you think of the dancers and blaring rock music at tournaments?
sentences.chinese: 你怎样看待比赛中的舞曲和摇滚音乐？

sentences.english: Finland is also home to the world's longest-running rock festival, Ruisrock.
sentences.chinese: 芬兰还是世界上持续时间最长的摇滚节的发源地。

sentences.english: He pleaded with us to let him go to the rock concert.
sentences.chinese: 他请求我们让他去听摇滚音乐会。

sentences.english: It was time to pig out on rock and roll.
sentences.chinese: 该是尽情享受摇滚乐的时候了。

sentences.english: A： I always turn the mega bass on when I listen to rock.
sentences.chinese: 我听摇滚乐时总是喜欢打开超重低音。

sentences.english: Rock music and blues are the main influences on hs music.
sentences.chinese: 摇滚乐和布鲁斯对他的音乐有着主要的影响。

sentences.english: When it comes to rock music, Aerosmith is my favorite band.
sentences.chinese: 提到摇滚乐，史密斯飞船是我最喜欢的乐队。

definition: Cui Jian (1961-), father of Chinese rock music
